function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 outbreak causing factory shutdowns and reduced production","Impact":"Global Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) decrease by 5 to 15%","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety measures in factories, invest in remote work capabilities","Technologies":"Remote work tools, health monitoring technology","People":"Factory workers, global investors","Owner":"Factory owners, government authorities"},{"Description":"Supply chain vulnerability due to reliance on suppliers from countries with more COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Disruption in supply chain and production delays for SMEs","Mitigation":"Diversify suppliers, implement stringent hygiene and screening measures for incoming goods","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, screening technology","People":"SMEs, suppliers","Owner":"SME owners, supply chain managers"},{"Description":"Air and ocean freight crunch due to lack of flights and container imbalance","Impact":"Affecting the supply chain of SMEs, increased freight rates","Mitigation":"Develop alternative transportation methods, optimize cargo capacity on available flights and ships","Technologies":"Transportation management systems, cargo optimization tools","People":"Logistics managers, freight companies","Owner":"Logistics companies, government authorities"}]}
